txt.en: This note implicates one of Céola's men as a traitor, assisting Hafoc's brigands. There is a seal upon the note, which Céola might recognize.
'What is this? One of my men is a traitor? Aye, I recognize this seal...it belongs to Dagbert's house. I will have him hanged!\n\n'Men, go at once and seize Dagbert the traitor!'
'Alas, Dagbert escaped us...I wonder what mischief he will bring...?'
'If only Dagbert had not escaped us...I fear he will bring terrible danger to us all.'
You found a note among the effects of Hafoc, the rogue captain of the brigands.
'If Dagbert shows his face among us again, he will perish!'
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands, south of Helstor.\n\nYou shoud bring the note you found to Céola at once, for it implicates one of his men as a traitor.
